properties.sfomuseum:description: Handwritten letter from Harold M. Bixby to his wife, Debby Bixby, dated Monday, June 26, [1933], on stationery from the Metropole Hotel in Shanghai; mentions [Paul] Groeger.
properties.wof:name: correspondence: Harold M. Bixby to Debby Bixby
